feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Auto builds icons before dev and build scripts by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20304
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20307
  • fix: Add salesforce query validation in integration tests by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20209
  • fix: flaky 'People filter includes bookings where filtered person is attendee' e2e test by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20311
  • chore: Upgrade Next to 15.2.3 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20315
  • docs: use correct variables in reschedule <Booker /> code snippet by @AyanavaKarmakar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20316
  • fix: calendar setting skeleton by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20317
  • fix: lint errors by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20323
  • chore: Upgrade @sentry/nextjs to 9.8.0 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20324
  • fix: continue-on-error to false for the lint test. by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20325
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20320

New Contributors

  • @AyanavaKarmakar made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20316

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.4...v5.1.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: increase memory requirement for building atoms by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20306
  • revert: "fix: lint (#20325)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20337
  • fix: Hydration error in root layout by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20312
  • chore(docs): remove AWS Amplify one-click deploy by @ShrootBuck in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20330
  • docs: fix invalid JSX being used in code snippets on platform/guides/booking-redirects by @AyanavaKarmakar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20321
  • feat: Added org username to admin users view by @avnish100 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20254
  • fix: Don't throw 202 on no handler found by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20339
  • fix: rewrite /en/ paths to / by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20331
  • feat: improved observability on api v1 and webapp by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20302
  • feat: Salesforce - handle picklist field type by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20342
  • feat: rewrite all routes starting with supported lang code by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20346

New Contributors

  • @ShrootBuck made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20330

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.5...v5.1.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Upgrade jackson by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20107

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.6...v5.1.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Introduce a new prop in the session to extract the profile username when inside an org by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18979
  • fix: disable guest is not updating on event update by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20340
  • fix: relative URL is being used where an absolute URL is required by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20314
  • chore: cover more test cases for i18n routing e2e test by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20349
  • refactor: atoms dependency on web through AdditionalCalendarSelector by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20352
  • chore: move ServerTrans to packages/lib by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20353
  • fix: remove oAuth clientId from email when rescheduling platform booking by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20354
  • feat: upgrade @daily libs by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20348
  • fix: skip when browsing month has no available slots by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19626
  • fix: fixed onboarding steps with consistent loading state and button component by @ayush110404 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20350
  • chore: set daily video testing link to env var by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20359
  • fix: Buffers when combined with seated events by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20233
  • docs: Fix quickstart link by @0xIvan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20355
  • fix: some translations got wrong closing tags by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20360
  • chore: better korean translations by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20362

New Contributors

  • @ayush110404 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20350
  • @0xIvan made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20355

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.7...v5.1.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ci: add QA status badge by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20363
  • fix: type error in payment page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20366
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20367
  • fix: layout of dialog (edit location) on bookings page by @krakenftw in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20268
  • fix: Crash in vercel domain creation flow by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20281
  • fix: add UID filter to /insights/routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20356

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.8...v5.1.9
